category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_my_favorite_simulation_tools
preference.preference_description: Defines simulation tools that the analyst can configure as favorite tools to appear under the My Favorite Tools menu in CAE Manager. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. The string must correspond to a unique simulation process. In case of duplicate processes, the analyst must enter the complete name of the process with the inheritance using :: as a separator.
